properties.description: Always delete first then insert via setting order

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string,
	Product_Group as string
}
source(output(
		{Source Metric} as string,
		{Period Date} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{Species Common Name} as string,
		{Product Common Name} as string,
		Currency as string,
		UOM as string,
		Market as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string,
		Indicator as string,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		{Origin Port Country} as string,
		{Origin Port Region} as string,
		{Origin Port} as string,
		{Destination Port Country} as string,
		{Destination Port Region} as string,
		{Destination Port} as string,
		{Vessel Name} as string,
		Low as string,
		High as string,
		Average as string,
		Spot as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadSource
ReadSource aggregate(groupBy({Species Common Name},
		{Product Common Name}),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> GetBusinessKeysForDelete
ReadSource select(mapColumn(
		{Source Metric},
		{Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		{Species Common Name},
		{Product Common Name},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		{Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		{Origin Port Country},
		{Origin Port Region},
		{Origin Port},
		{Destination Port Country},
		{Destination Port Region},
		{Destination Port},
		{Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForInsert
GetBusinessKeysForDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MultiDeleteRecordsByBusinessKeys
SelectForInsert sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertRecordsAfterDelete
